Sweet Kaaram Coffee (UA-16+)

Series

  • Release Date: 06 Jul 2023
  • Genre(s): Drama, Comedy, Family
  • Language(s): தமிழ்
  • Director(s): Bejoy Nambiar, Krishna Marimuthu
  • Cast(s): Madhoo , Lakshmi , Santhy Balachandran, Vamsikrishna , Samyuktha Viola Viswanathan See all Cast & Crew
  • Music: Govindh Vasantha,S Alagia Koothan,G. Suren
  • Similar To: Mad Company, Paper Rocket
  • Story:

    Sweet Kaaram Coffee is an upcoming Amazon Prime Original series starring Lakshmi, Madhoo, Santhy Balachandran in lead roles. Directed by Bejoy Nambiar, Krishna Marimuthu, Swathi Raghuraaman. Its all about three generations of women from the same family set off on an epic road trip.
